title: Banor Capital
subtitle: Impact Investment & Blended Capital
description: Investment arm structured to attract impact investors, fund redevelopment projects, and scale the Banor model globally.
intro: Banor Capital channels impact-focused capital into the integrated ecosystem. Investors achieve financial returns and measurable social impact—properties restored, youth trained, jobs created.

sections.title: Investment Thesis
sections.content: Redevelopment succeeds when workforce, property, and capital align. Banor's integrated model reduces execution risk, builds local capacity, and generates both financial and impact returns. We seek investors who value both.

steps.title: Philanthropic Layer
steps.description: Foundations and donors fund workforce training. Concessional capital de-risks the ecosystem.

steps.title: Impact Layer
steps.description: Impact investors fund early-stage projects. Below-market returns, measurable impact.

steps.title: Market Layer
steps.description: Stabilized projects attract market-rate capital. Institutional investors enter.

steps.title: Reinvest
steps.description: Returns flow to Foundation and new Development. Scale across cities.

items.title: Philanthropic Layer
items.description: Foundations and donors fund Foundation programs. Concessional capital for workforce training.

items.title: Impact Layer
items.description: Impact investors target below-market returns with measurable social outcomes.

items.title: Market Layer
items.description: Market-rate capital for stabilized projects. Risk-adjusted returns for institutional investors.

sections.title: Risk Mitigation Strategy
sections.content: Workforce pipeline reduces labor cost and schedule risk. Development expertise reduces execution risk. Blended capital structure aligns incentives. Diversified project pipeline reduces concentration risk.

sections.title: Become an Impact Investor
sections.content: Accredited investors, foundations, and family offices—explore opportunities to invest in the Banor ecosystem.
